list.title: module:css-breakpoint.CssBreakpoints#at
list.description: Get a breakpoint by key

list.title: module:css-breakpoint.CssBreakpoints#getBreakpoint
list.description: Get breakpoint from element (design note: user could override prototype)

list.title: module:css-breakpoint.CssBreakpoints#update
list.description: Updates the active breakpoint by checking the element and executes handlers on change

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~Breakpoint#_setDirection
list.description:
Private method used inrternally for managing direction activation

  • Each direction manages it's own state and handlers

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~Breakpoint#max
list.description:
Attach handler to be executed from the breakpoint and to all breakpoints below.

  • If the browser resizes from a breakpoint below this breakpoint, and above the breakpoint name specified, this handler will fire

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~Breakpoint#min
list.description:
Attach handler to be executed from the breakpoint and to all breakpoints below.

  • If the browser resizes from a breakpoint above this breakpoint, and below the breakpoint name specified, this handler will fire

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~Breakpoint#only
list.description: Attach a handler to fire when the breakpoint is within the key

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~Breakpoint#remove
list.description: Remove handler

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~BreakpointDirection#_call
list.description: Calls all functions in handlers or

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~BreakpointDirection#add
list.description: Adds a handler for the direction, optionally use object to add off state handler

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~BreakpointDirection#change
list.description: Change the state of the direction

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~BreakpointDirection#getHandlers
list.description: Returns handlers in normalized object format on/off

list.title: module:css-breakpoint~BreakpointDirection#remove
list.description: Removes a handler

list.title: module:events.dispatch
list.description: Triggers one of our custom events

list.title: module:events.getName
list.description: Handles the actual event names being used (future could namespace)

list.title: module:events~events
list.description: Event object - called on dispatch

list.title: module:flipcard.Flipcard#onProxyClick
list.description:
Click handler on everything on container

  • Determines if click was something that should be ignored (link, etc)

list.title: module:grid.init
list.description: Sets up document for grid position classes

list.title: module:grid.setPositionClasses
list.description:
Sets up the positonal classes that would come from the equal height module. Needs to be rerun by user when layout changes or new instances are added to the screen

  • Used for gutter crops
  • Used for rule placement
  • Devs Remember that default classes should match sass defaults

list.title: module:grid.setup
list.description: Goes through document and finds elements that need to have positioning classes

list.title: module:logger.log
list.description: Proxy Console.log

list.title: module:logger.logError
list.description: Proxy Console.error

list.title: module:logger.logWarning
list.description: Proxy Console.warn

list.title: module:logger.set
list.description: Changes to make to configuration

list.title: module:logger~config
list.description: Configuration Object

list.title: module:modals.close
list.description: Close a modal

list.title: module:modals.setupModal
list.description:
Function to setup each modal

  • Creates structure
  • Gets settings from elements data attrite
  • Moves it to the end of the document
  • Adds resizer if position (left || right)

list.title: module:modals.show
list.description: Open a modal

list.title: module:node-data-manager#destroy
list.description: Destroy all references to data and nodes/elements

list.title: module:node-data-manager#find
list.description: Return an elements store object

list.title: module:node-data-manager#get
list.description: Get data for an element/node

list.title: module:node-data-manager#set
list.description: Bind data to a specific Node/Element

list.title: module:overflow-scroller-pager
list.description:
Function to be used in overflow scrollers "amount" option. This function will determine how many items can fit in the viewport, taking into account scroll padding left, and will set the scroll amount to paginate between items. Items size can be anything (ie. one per screen vs 3.5 per screen will both work). This seperated from the plugin for tree shaking incase it's unneeded. Currently this is only setup for horizontal scrolling

Note: This is setup to return the function, incase configuration is needed in the future it can be passed to the create function

list.title: module:pause-youtube-video.pauseVideos
list.description:
Somewhat hacky way to pause the video

  • https://www.digitalredpanther.com/blog/play-pause-stop-youtube-embed
  • Actual JS API documentation (Didn't follow this for now) (https://developers.google.com/youtube/iframe_api_reference)

list.title: module:pause-youtube-video.prepVideos
list.description:
Prep videos to be paused

  • Add query parameters for js API
  • Removes all other query parameters from iframe.src
